statements: SELECT * FROM VaR_Calculation;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM VaR_Calculation WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM VaR_Calculation WHERE risk_factor < 0.5 ORDER BY instrument_id DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, price FROM VaR_Calculation ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM VaR_Calculation;
SELECT * FROM VaR_Calculation WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM VaR_Calculation WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, price, quantity, risk_factor FROM VaR_Calculation WHERE risk_factor < 0.5;
SELECT instrument_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_value FROM VaR_Calculation GROUP BY instrument_name HAVING total_value > 50000;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, price, quantity, risk_factor FROM VaR_Calculation WHERE price < 100 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY risk_factor ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT id, instrument_name, market_value FROM financial_instruments WHERE market_value > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, last_updated FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT instrument_name, market_value, last_updated FROM financial_instruments WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT instrument_name, market_value FROM financial_instruments WHERE market_value > 1000000 ORDER BY market_value DESC;

SELECT fi.instrument_name, vc.var_value, vc.calculation_date FROM financial_instruments fi JOIN var_calculations vc ON fi.id = vc.instrument_id WHERE vc.calculated_by = 'Risk team' ORDER BY vc.calculation_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, market_value FROM financial_instruments WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_instruments, AVG(market_value) AS avg_market_value FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM financial_instruments WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM risk_factors ORDER BY volatility DESC;
SELECT factor_name, correlation FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_factor_id = 3;
SELECT instrument_id, var_value FROM var_results WHERE result_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM financial_instruments WHERE quantity > 1000 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT symbol, volatility, correlation FROM risk_factors WHERE volatility > 0.5 AND correlation < 0.2;

SELECT fi.symbol, rf.factor_name, vr.var_value FROM financial_instruments fi INNER JOIN risk_factors rf ON fi.symbol = rf.factor_name JOIN var_results vr ON fi.symbol = vr.instrument_id WHERE vr.var_value > 500;

SELECT fi.symbol, COUNT(vr.result_id) AS num_results FROM financial_instruments fi LEFT JOIN var_results vr ON fi.symbol = vr.instrument_id GROUP BY fi.symbol HAVING num_results > 2 ORDER BY num_results DESC;
SELECT * FROM VAR_Calculation;
SELECT instrument_name, asset_class FROM Instruments ORDER BY asset_class;
SELECT instrument_id, date, var_value FROM VAR_Calculation WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Risk_Periods WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT instrument_id, risk_value FROM Risk_Values WHERE risk_value > 0 ORDER BY risk_value DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, asset_class FROM Instruments WHERE asset_class = 'Equity' ORDER BY instrument_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(var_value) AS max_var_value, instrument_id FROM VAR_Calculation WHERE date = '2022-09-30' GROUP BY instrument_id;

SELECT i.instrument_id, i.instrument_name, r.period_id, r.start_date, r.end_date FROM Instruments i INNER JOIN Risk_Values v ON i.instrument_id = v.instrument_id INNER JOIN Risk_Periods r ON v.period_id = r.period_id WHERE i.asset_class = 'Fixed Income' ORDER BY r.start_date DESC;
SELECT i.instrument_id, i.instrument_name, v.instrument_id, MAX(risk_value) AS max_risk_value FROM Instruments i LEFT JOIN Risk_Values v ON i.instrument_id = v.instrument_id GROUP BY i.instrument_id;

SELECT i.instrument_id, i.instrument_name, v.instrument_id, SUM(risk_value) AS total_risk_value FROM Instruments i LEFT JOIN Risk_Values v ON i.instrument_id = v.instrument_id GROUP BY i.instrument_id HAVING total_risk_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT name, type FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, price FROM instruments JOIN prices ON instruments.id = prices.instrument_id;
SELECT manager_id, name FROM portfolios ORDER BY manager_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE opening_price < closing_price;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, type, quantity FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT p.name AS portfolio_name, i.name AS instrument_name, pr.price FROM portfolios p INNER JOIN instruments i ON p.id = i.id INNER JOIN prices pr ON i.id = pr.instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';

SELECT pr.id AS price_id, i.name AS instrument_name, m.opening_price, m.closing_price FROM prices pr INNER JOIN instruments i ON pr.instrument_id = i.id INNER JOIN market_data m ON pr.instrument_id = m.instrument_id;
